actions.recommendation: Abnormal audiology screen with decreased hearing bilaterally. You do however have wax impacted bilaterally. Cerumol prescribed. Please have wax removed once softened& repeat audiology review.
Prostate screens over the age of 50. Your PSA was normal.
The biggest concern for future complications is your smoking and inactivity with poor dietary choices. Please see a dietitian, aim to be active on a daily basis and enjoy retirement.

You had a flu like illness in the last 2 weeks and completed antibiotics. This could have affected your inflammation marker levels on your blood tests. Persisting post nasal drip and blocked nose - treatment prescribed.
